title: Sarath Gamage re-elected President of ISMM for 2nd term
body_lines: The Institute of Supply and Materials Management held its Annual General Meeting on 26 March and re-elected its incumbent President Sarath Gamage unanimously for the second term. Gamage is also the Vice President of The Organisation of Professional Associations (OPA) Sri Lanka and the Chairman of the Membership Committee of OPA. He served ISMM under the capacity of Vice President for 4 consecutive years and held the position as the General Secretary for 2 years. He was the Chairman of the Professional Development and Training Committee and Membership and Marketing Committee of ISMM.
